name: Lemon Grenade
description:
A 2D action-packed shooting game. Kill all the enemies in the room before they kill you.

WASD/Arrow keys to move; Spacebar to shoot. Aim with the cursor.

This is a work in progress (I've been working on it for 6 weeks). The levels aren't particularly impressive right now, but they will be improved.

This is the first complete prototype. Art, visual effects and levels are being worked on right now (but progress will be slow).

I'm gonna improve some of the other projects on my site, and learn some more stuff before continuing with this (probably after two months)

If you think this game is worth some money, please donate! It'll help me spend more time working on this.

Code: CosmoBrain

Art: Celestial Tater
